CutSceneText.Text: Dranas regenerate quickly, so it's difficult to destroy them.
I struggled with the solution for quite a while.
Have you noticed the Klaws in Balaurea?
They have a digestive gland strong enough to digest even Dranas.
Recover a Klaw's Digestive Gland and take it to Diana of Sanctum.
She will make you a powerful Drana solvent.
